post.author: 박선교
post.content:
I found a good article from July 30, 2007 issue of Computer World. If you prepare an interview, it might help reading it.

I can't attach the file. (error with
"Warning: move_uploaded_file(data/career/Why_Should_I_Hire_You.doc) [function.move-uploaded-file]: failed to open stream: Permission denied in /home/coskaco/public_html/v2003/write_ok.php on line 221

Warning: move_uploaded_file() [function.move-uploaded-file]: Unable to move '/tmp/phpKihh2J' to 'data/career/Why_Should_I_Hire_You.doc' in /home/coskaco/public_html/v2003/write_ok.php on line 221".

If someone is interested in this article, please send me an e-mail (sun.park@scotiabank.com), then I'll send it to you.

Or you can go to ComputerWorld.com and search 'Why should i hire you' and you'll be able to see it on-line.

Thanks
post.title: Why Should I Hire You?
